Hanzi: 缝

綘字的基本解释

綘
féng
古同“缝”。

綘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［féng］
［《廣韻》符容切，平鍾，奉。］
“缝1”的繁体字。亦作“綘1”。
(1)用针线连缀。
(2)补合。
[②]［fèng］
［《廣韻》扶用切，去用，奉。］
“缝2”的繁体字。
(1)缝合的地方。
(2)空隙；裂缝。

綘字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綘； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页926第13
【集韻】縫，或省作綘。詳縫字註。

綘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
綘字的起名意思

暂无。

綘
Basic explanation of words
綘
féng
The ancient same "sewn".
綘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［féng］
["Guangyun" Fu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Feng. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "seam 1". Also known as "綘1".
(1) Connect with needles and threads.
(2) Supplement.
[②]［fèng］
["Guangyun" help to cut, use, and bless. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Seam 2".
(1) Place of stitching.
(2) Voids; cracks.
綘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　綘; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 926 to 13
[Jiyun] Sewing, or province for 綘. Note for detailed stitching.
綘
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
綘
Name meaning
Nothing.
fèng, féng
variant of 缝
to sew
